    HackerRank

    Hacker Rank Tutorial

    This blog post provide a simple explanation to each of the Hacker Rank C++ practice problems labeled under introduction.

    As per the FAQ of hacker rank you are allowed to post code of non ongoing contests.

    Say "Hello, World" With C++

    Hacker Rank Say “Hello, World” With C++

    Output: Print “Hello, World”

    Explanation: cout is a predefined object of ostream class and is used to print to the standard output device. In order to use cout you must include the iostream header which defines the...
